au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.jpathplan.entites

Class ComputedPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.jpathplan.entites.Plan
      • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.jpathplan.entites.ComputedPlan

  • public class ComputedPlan
extends Plan
    The shortest path computed by any path planning algorithm. This class stores the nodes in order in which they are added. This class is immutable and does not allow modifications to the path once it has been created (all the waypoints/nodes in a path have been added and the cost has been set).
    Author:
    Abhijeet Anand (abhijeet [dot] anand [at] rmit [dot] edu [dot] au)

      • prependStep

        public int prependStep(State wayPoint)
        Add a step at the beginning of the path.
        Parameters:
        wayPoint -
        Returns:

        -1 otherwise.

      • resetSteps

        public boolean resetSteps()
        Description copied from class: Plan
        Reset the pointer to the current step to the beginning of the path, such that the next call to getNextStep returns Nodes from the beginning of the path.
        Specified by:
        resetSteps in class Plan
        Returns:
        true if the iterator on this path was successfully reset to the start;
        false otherwise.

      • setCost

        public boolean setCost(float cost)
        Set the total cost of this path. Once the cost has been set, it cannot be changed, which also locks the path from any further modification. Hence, the cost should be set after the path has been populated with waypoints.
        Parameters:
        cost -
        Returns:
        true, if successful;
        false otherwise.
